title: Nautica Men's 3-Pack Heathered V-Neck T-Shirt
description: Moisture Control: Nautica T-Shirts are breathable and transmits moisture away from the body, allowing you to remain comfortable all day
Durability: Strong tensile strength cotton makes Nautica's undershirts great long lasting base layers
Heathered cotton jersey blend that will keep you feeling fresh and comfortable all day. Short Sleeve V-Neck design that offers a body-confident feel for a lean, contoured fit.
Iconic Nautica Sail logo at left hem

A timeless silhouette from Nautica offered in a pack of 3, these classic V-Neck undershirts feature heathered fabrication and lightweight, super soft cotton/polyester construction. Always tagless for ultimate comfort, these cotton stretch t-shirts are perfectly tailored and will not bunch up under clothes. The flat ribbed collar will keep it's shape wash after wash. Short sleeve design finished with Iconic Nautica Sail logo at left hem.
